message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its value and the benefits it brings, I propose a price of $950000 for you to acquire this exceptional item.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll be getting from the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the market value and the quality of the product, I propose a price of $900000 for you to consider.
I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $850000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $875000?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $890000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I'm getting close, but I still think we can do better. Would you be willing to meet me at $880000?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I am pleased to offer you the product at $885000. This is my final offer, and I believe it provides a fair balance between the value of the product and the price you're willing to pay.
I understand this is your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable going above $875000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. Would you consider $870000?
Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to offer the product to you for $875000. This is my final offer, and I believe it reflects a fair compromise between our positions.

I appreciate your persistence, but I've reached my limit. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. I'll make one final offer: $860000. If you're willing to meet me there, I'll make the deal. If not, I'll explore other options.
